AdjustTokenPriveleges.description: enables/disables privileges in access token; used in privilege escalation

AttachThreadInput.description: attaches/detaches the input processing of one thread to another; used in keyloggers/spyware

BitBlt.description: bit block transfer of graphic data; used in spyware for screencaps

CallNextHook.description: calls the next hook in the chain; event hook set by SetWindowsHookEx

CertOpenSystemStore.description: accesses the certificates stored on the local system

CheckRemoteDebuggerPresent.description: checks if a process is being debugged

CoCreateInstance.description: creates a COM object; CLSID denotes which file contains code to implement the object

ConnectNamedPipe.description: enables a server pipe for interprocess communication; used in backdoors

ControlService.description: starts, stops, modifies, or sends a control code to a service

ChangeServiceConfig.description: changes the configuration of a service

CreateFile.description: creates or opens a file or I/O device

TerminateProcess.description: murders a process in cold blood

accept.description: listens for incoming connections on a socket; used in c2

bind.description: associates a local address with a socket; used in c2

connect.description: establishes a connection to a specified socket; used in c2

CreateFileMapping.description: creates a handle to a file mapping that loads a file into memory; used in launchers, loaders, injection

CreateMutex.description: creates a mutual exclusion object; used by malware for deduplication

CreateProcess.description: creates and launches a new process

CreateRemoteThread.description: start a thread in a remote process; used in launchers and injection

CreateService.description: creates a service; used for persistence, stealth, or loading kernel drivers

CreateToolhelp32Snapshot.description: creates a snapshot of processes, heaps, threads, and modules; used to iterate through processes and threads

DeviceIoControl.description: sends a control message from user-space to a device driver; used in kernel malware

DllCanUnloadNow.description: an exported function that indicates that the program implements a COM server

DllGetClassObject.description: an exported function that indicates that the program implements a COM server

DllInstall.description: an exported function that indicates that the program implements a COM server

DllRegisterServer.description: an exported function that indicates that the program implements a COM server

DllUnregisterServer.description: an exported function that indicates that the program implements a COM server

EnableExecuteProtectionSupport.description: modifies the Data Execution Protection (DEP) settings of the host

EnumProcesses.description: enumerates running processes; used to find target for injection

EnumProcessModules.description: enumerates loaded modules for a given process; used in injection

FindFirstFile.description: used to search through a directory

FindNextFile.description: used to search through a directory

FindResource.description: finds a resource in a PE file; used in droppers

FindWindow.description: finds an open window on the desktop; used in anti-debugging

FtpPutFile.description: uploads a file to a remote FTP server

GetAdaptersInfo.description: gets information about the system's network adapters; used in fingerprinting and anti-vm (MAC addr check)

GetAsyncKeyState.description: queries whether a particular key is being pressed  / was pressed since previous call; used in keyloggers

GetDC.description: gets a handle to a device context for a window or screen; used in spyware for screencaps

GetWindowDC.description: gets a handle to a device context for a window; used in spyware for screencaps

GetForegroundWindow.description: gets a handle to the window currently in the foreground; used in keyloggers

gethostbyname.description: performs DNS lookup on a hostname

gethostname.description: gets hostname of the computer; used in backdoors and fingerprinting

GetKeyState.description: queries whether a particular key is being pressed; used in keyloggers

GetModuleFilename.description: gets the filename of a loaded module; used to modify/copy files in the process

GetModuleHandle.description: gets a handle to a loaded module; used to locate/modify/inject code

GetProcAddress.description: gets address of a function in a loaded DLL; used to import functions from other DLLs

GetStartupInfo.description: gets details about how the current process is configured to run

GetSystemDefaultLangId.description: gets default language settings for the system; used in fingerprinting and custom displays

GetTempPath.description: gets the system's temporary file path

GetThreadContext.description: gets the context structure for a given thread; contains info like reg values and current state

GetTickCount.description: gets number of miliseconds since boot; used in anti-debugging; often included by compiler

GetTickCount64.description: gets number of miliseconds since boot; used in anti-debugging; often included by compiler

GetVersion.description: gets Windows version info; used in fingerprinting

GetWindowsDirectory.description: gets path to the Windows directory

GetSystemDirectory.description: gets path to the system directory

inet_addr.description: converts a string containing an IPv4 address to an IN_ADDR struct

InternetOpen.description: initializes internet access functions from WinINet

InternetOpenUrl.description: opens a specified URL via FTP, HTTP, or HTTPS

InternetReadFile.description: reads data from an opened URL

InternetWriteFile.description: writes data to an opened URL

IsDebuggerPresent.description: checks whether the process is being debugged; used in anti-debugging; often included by compiler

IsNTAdmin.description: checks whether user has admin privileges

IsWow64Process.description: checks whether specified process is 32b running in 64b Windows

LdrLoadDll.description: loads a DLL into a process; typically done by LoadLibrary

LoadLibrary.description: loads a DLL into a process

LoadResource.description: loads a resource from a PE file into memory; used in droppers

LsaEnumerateLogonSessions.description: enumerates logon sessions on the system; used in cred dumping

MapViewOfFile.description: maps a file into memory; used by launchers, loaders, and injection

MapVirtualKey.description: gets character value from a virtual-key code; used in keyloggers

MmGetSystemRoutineAddress.description: gets the address of a function from another module included in ntoskrnl.exe or hal.dll (kernel)

Module32First.description: used to enumerate loaded modules in a process; used in injection

Module32Next.description: used to enumerate loaded modules in a process; used in injection

NetScheduleJobAdd.description: creates a scheduled task (at job, so pre Windows 8); can be remote; used for persistence

NtQueryDirectoryFile.description: queries info about files in a directory; hooked by rootkits to hide files

NtQueryInformationProcess.description: queries info about a process; used in anti-debugging

NtSetInformationProcess.description: changes privilege level of process or bypasses Data Execution Protection (DEP)

OpenMutex.description: opens a handle to a mutual exclusion object; used by malware for deduplication

OpenProcess.description: opens a handle to a process; enables reading/writing/injection

OpenSCManager.description: opens a handle to the service control manager; used for persistence

OutputDebugString.description: outputs a string to a debugger; used in anti-debugging

PeekNamedPipe.description: copies data from a named pipe without consuming it; used in backdoors

Process32First.description: used to enumerate processes after a CreateToolhelp32Snapshot call; used to find injection target

Process32Next.description: used to enumerate processes after a CreateToolhelp32Snapshot call; used to find injection target

QueryPerformanceCounter.description: gets value of hardware-based performance counter; used in anti-debugging

QueryUserAPC.description: adds asynchronous procedure call (APC) to the queue of a thread; used in injection

ReadProcessMemory.description: reads the memory of another process

recv.description: receives data from a socket; used in backdoors

RegisterHotKey.description: registers a handler for a key combination; used in keyloggers

RegOpenKey.description: opens a handle to a registry key

RegSetValue.description: sets a value for a registry key

RegGetValue.description: gets the value for a specified registry key

RegQueryValue.description: gets the value for a specified registry key

ResumeThread.description: resumes the execution of a suspended thread; used in injection

RtlCreateRegistryKey.description: creates a registry key from kernel space

RtlWriteRegistryValue.description: writes a value to a registry key from kernel space

SamIConnect.description: initializes connection to the Security Account Manager (SAM) DB; used in cred dumping

SamIGetPrivateData.description: gets private info about a user from the Security Account Manager (SAM) DB; used in cred dumping

SamQueryInformationUse.description: gets info about a user from the Security Account Manager (SAM) DB; used in cred dumping

send.description: sends data to a socket; used in backdoors and C2

SetFileTime.description: modifies MACB timestamps of a file; timestomping

SetThreadContext.description: sets the context for a thread; used in injection

SetWindowsHook.description: sets a hook function to be triggered by a specified event; used in keyloggers

StartServiceCtrlDispatcher.description: connects the main thread of a service process to the service control manager

SuspendThread.description: suspends a thread; used in code injection

system.description: launches a program; wrapper to CreateProcess

Thread32First.description: used to enumerate through process threads; used in injection

Thread32Next.description: used to enumerate through process threads; used in injection

Toolhelp32ReadProcessMemory.description: copies memory from a remote process into a buffer

URLDownloadToFile.description: downloads a file from a web server and saves it to disk; used in downloaders

VirtualAlloc.description: allocates memory in a remote process; used in injection

VirtualProtect.description: changes the protection on a region of memory for a remote process

WideCharToMultiByte.description: converts a unicode string to ASCII

Wow64DisableWow64FsRedirection.description: disables file system redirection on WOW64 files; enables writing to System32 folder

WriteProcessMemory.description: writes data to a process; used in injection

CreateCompatibleDC.description: creates a memory device context; used in spyware for screencaps

CreateCompatibleBitmap.description: creates a bitmap compatible with a device context; used in spyware for screencaps

WriteFile.description: writes a file to disk or I/O device

ReadFile.description: reads a file from disk or I/O device

OpenFile.description: creates, opens, or deletes a file

OpenFileMapping.description: opens a named file mapping object

GetSystemTime.description: gets the current system date and time in UTC; used in timestomping, delayed execution, anti-debugging

SetFileAttributes.description: sets attributes for a file or directory

CreatPipe.description: creates an anonymous pipe; used in backdoors

timeGetTime.description: gets system time in milliseconds; used in anti-debugging

DebugActiveProcess.description: enables a debugger to attach to an active process and debug it; used in anti-debugging

LockResource.description: obtains a pointer to resource in a PE file; used in droppers

socket.description: creates network socket; used in backdoors and C2

InternetConnect.description: Opens an File Transfer Protocol (FTP) or HTTP session for a given site; used in backdoors and C2
